question: Does your project require coordination of multiple simultaneous disparate project elements intertwined throughout your existing operating facility with priority on uninterrupted operations during construction?
description: For instance, your core team may not have significant experience and manpower to address a single compact project within your existing facility, but not have sufficient manpower and experience with simultaneous projects interspersed within your existing project footprint. Example: NY Transportation Development Corporation LaGuardia Airport Redevelopment P3.
